item.description: Interaction among members using their Spanish skills. Bring a small amount of food for everyone to share. If any of you have topics of interest that you would like to discuss that evening please send me an email. I will set aside time during the meet up for you speak to the group.
item.how_to_find_us: A sign will be placed at the Library's front desk

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fiesta
